name: Dallas

authority.name: City of Dallas Parking Adjudication Office
authority.authority_name: City of Dallas Parking Adjudication Office
authority.serves_description: Parking citations issued by the City of Dallas on public streets.

citation_pattern.notes: Dallas citations include a numeric citation number printed on the ticket.

submission_methods.notes: Administrative hearings may be requested online, by mail, or in person at the Adjudication Office.

phone_confirmation.purpose: Confirm this is the correct Phase-1 mailing address for Dallas parking citations.

verification.source_note: By-mail request instructions on Dallas City Hall Parking Violations page show mail requests must be sent to City of Dallas Parking Adjudication Office, 2014 Main Street, Dallas, TX 75201-4406 and provide contact phone 214-670-4830【442481854652253†L35-L46】【442481854652253†L59-L63】.

official_confirmation_department: City of Dallas Parking Adjudication Office
official_confirmation_purpose: Confirm Phase-1 appeal mailing addresses and issuing authority routing.
qa_blocking_issues: DFW Airport, SMU, UT Southwestern, UT Dallas, University of Dallas, and DART sections lack confirmed mailing addresses for Phase-1 appeals; confirm or obtain addresses.
qa_known_gaps: Citation number patterns across authorities are speculative with low confidence.
UT Dallas information is unavailable (Bad Gateway) and requires direct confirmation.
Need to verify whether DART issues parking citations and whether any mail submission exists for appeals.
